XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 462.
_description: Fill the Bowl, Butler — five 5-line stanzas (aaabb) including refrain and burden: ‘How butler how Bevis a towt / Fill the boll jentill butler & let the cup rowght’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Ientill butler bellamyFyll þe boll by þe
                    eye…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…With how butler how Bevis a towghtFill þe boll butler
                    & let þe cup rowghtExplicit
OxfBal354.Facsimiles:
Early Manuscripts at Oxford University: Facsimile
                    of Oxford, Balliol MS 354.
         (http://image.ox.ac.uk/show?collection=balliol&manuscript=ms354).
